languageKey.label: Centar zadataka sa pregledima, poruka, ZaUraditi listama

Task centar omogućuje pristup internim Za-uraditi listama, porukama, akcijama, Brzom podjestniku i sl. Takođe omogućuje pristup skraćenicama za dostupne front-end module i nedavno uređivanim stranicama. Centar zadataka je mjesto gdje radite svoje dnevne zadatke.
Centar zadataka.
Task Center with overviews, messages, ToDo lists

The task center provides access to your internal To-Do list, messages, Quick-note, actions etc. It also provides shortcuts to your available frontend modules and most recently edited pages. The Task Center is where you keep track of your daily tasks and workflows.
Task center
